Package logicLayer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventNotifiactionPublisher.NotifiactionSource
    Notification source is supposed to invoke update method when notification list is changed
    EventNotifiactionPublisher.NotificationReciver  
    Importer
    Interface that abstract out importing from different formats and APIs Corresponding Importer and Saver implementation should be compatible
    LogicLayer
    Interface that generalize logic layer.
    Saver
    Interface to abstract out serialisation to different formats and exporting to different APIs Corresponding Importer and Saver implementation should be compatible
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryImporter
    Binary serializer - save
    BinarySaver
    Basic binary Saver implementation based on java ObjectOutputStream
    EventNotifiactionPublisher
    Notification publisher based on listener-subscriber design pattern
    LogicLayerFactory
    Factory that produces different versions of LogicLayerImpl
    LogicLayerImpl  
    LogicLayerSQLImpl
    LogicLayer implementation extended to include database operations --ex: creation and save to database
    OpenOfficeSaver  
    SortingAndSearchPolicies
    Implementation of sorting and searching algorithms to perform operations on DataService object
    XMLImporter
    Importer implementation based on Xstrem which imports files saved in XML format
    XMLSaver
    Implementation of saver which uses Xstream to save data in XML format
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LogicLayerException
    Exception to throw in logic layer
